metadata.title: Love to Treasure Sister Contemporary Urn Bracelet with Personalized Engraving - Memorial Ash Keepsake - Cremation Jewelry
features: Stainless Steel Urn Bracelet designed to hold a small amount of a loved one or petâ€™s ashes
Personalized with your message Laser Engraved on back
Measuring approximately 22cm/7.87" in overall length and 1.1cm/0.43" in width.
Including Black Velvet Gift Bag and Funnel
description: This beautiful piece of high quality jewellery is designed to hold a small 'token' amount of a loved one's ashes, ensuring that there is always a part of them held close to you. We will also Engrave the back of the bracelet with your own Personalized message using our state of the art metal laser engraver.This highly polished, solid 316L Stainless Steel bracelet has "Sister" inscribed on it and is connected by strong high quality leather cord. Measuring approximately 22cm/7.87" in overall length and 1.1cm/0.43" in width. This bracelet can be reduced by cutting cord to required length. How do I enter the personalisation? Add the item to your basket and click "This item is a gift" Proceed to the checkout In the "Free Gift Message Box" enter your personalisation. Please take care when entering your message as what you enter here will be exactly what appears on the product and we cannot accept Personalized items as returns. The bracelet can hold 2 lines of text with up to 12 characters (including spaces) per line engraved horizontally. Font and Style will be as Engraving examples image on this listing. Please note that the more characters/lines you have, the smaller the text will be. Please note when we receive your message it does not include your spacing so we will use our best judgement when laying out the personalisation sent to us, please contact us if you require your personalisation to be laid out in a specific format.
